name: Veggie Stir-Fry
description: A colorful and healthy stir-fry packed with vegetables and Asian-inspired flavors. Quick to prepare and fully plant-based.
instructions: Slice all vegetables into thin strips.
Heat sesame oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 5–7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Pour in soy sauce and toss to coat evenly.
Serve hot with a side of cooked rice.
